name: Overcooked - Recreation
description:
P1 Controls: WASD for movement, C to pick up and put down, and hold Left CNTRL to cut food/clean dishes, Left Shift to dash

P2 Controls: Arrow Keys for movement, Comma to pick up and put down, and hold Period to cut food/clean dishes, Right Shift to dash

This is our recreation of an Overcooked level. Unfortunately, not everything works as well in WebGl as it does in Unity... 

There are a lot more systems in Overcooked than one would think at first glance. It's not particularly a model heavy game but it's about how those models interact with each other and change slightly that matters. Most of the model work was handled by Samina Trachier while most of the code was done by Kevin Ray and Mary Li. This was made as part of a 6 week assignment for our Game Development course and I think we all learned a lot from this project. 

Kevin Ray
